mapper.select: SELECT challenge_id, email, joined_at, status, difficulty_code, required_success_days, daily_target_value, progress_percentage, success_days, last_evaluated_at, completed_at FROM challenge_participants WHERE challenge_id = #{challengeId} AND email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO challenge_participants ( challenge_id, email, joined_at, status, difficulty_code, required_success_days, daily_target_value, progress_percentage, success_days, last_evaluated_at, completed_at ) VALUES ( #{challengeId}, #{email}, #{joinedAt}, #{status}, #{difficultyCode}, #{requiredSuccessDays}, #{dailyTargetValue}, #{progressPercentage}, #{successDays}, #{lastEvaluatedAt}, #{completedAt} )
